content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!--  <!DOCTYPE metadata SYSTEM "metadata.dtd">  --> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Minnesota Department of Education</origin> <pubdate>20070328</pubdate> <title>Minnesota Non-Public School Program Locations, School Year 2006-2007</title> <mgmg1cid></mgmg1cid> <pubinfo> <publish>Minnesota Department of Education</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>ftp://ftp.lmic.state.mn.us/pub/data/admin_poli/nonpub07.exe</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>These non-public school program locations cover non-public school programs with an MDE-FNS Unit Classification of 31-35. There are non-public schools in and outside of the MDE program that are not covered in this database. Locations have not gone through an extensive QA/QC process.</abstract> <purpose>MDE has been developing school program locations, both public and nonpublic, since 1998 in coordination with the Land Management Information Center (LMIC).  Nonpublic school locations is an addition to the existing public and charter school database. Initially developed in 1998-1999, this is the first major update of that original file.</purpose> <supplinf>Minnesota</supplinf> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2007</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Non-Public school program locations updated for school year 2006-2007.</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>Annually</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-97.071908</westbc> <eastbc>-91.152757</eastbc> <northbc>48.626078</northbc> <southbc>43.476096</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>structure, school, nonpublic school</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekey>Minnesota</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None</accconst> <useconst>If you obtain data from MDE, it is understood that you and/or your organization have the right to use them for any internal purpose. If you modify them, you should document those changes in a metadata record that should accompany all redistributed data.  If you transmit or provide these data in any form to another user, the data MUST be accompanied by a copy of MDE's disclaimer NOTICE.TXT and all documentation provided with the original data set including the full metadata record.</useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Scott Freburg</cntper> <cntorg>Minnesota Department of Education</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> Mailing and Physical</addrtype> <address>1500 Hwy 36 W</address> <city>Roseville</city> <state>MN</state> <postal>55113</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651-582-8789</cntvoice> <cntfax></cntfax> <cntemail>scott.freburg@state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen>None available</browsen> <browsed></browsed> </browse> <native>Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.780</native> <crossref> <citeinfo> <title>See related school datasets at: http://www.lmic.state.mn.us/chouse/metalong.html#admin</title> </citeinfo> </crossref> </idinfo> <dataqual> <attracc> <attraccr>All nonpublic locations were geocoded using either street centerline road files from The Lawrence Group (TLG), U.S. Census TIGER or online at Google maps.  Some locations have been moved based on 2003-2004 Farm Service Agency (FSA) aerial photography.</attraccr> </attracc> <logic>Not applicable</logic> <complete>Only those nonpublic schools identified as part of the Minnesota Department of Education, Food and Nutrition Service with a Unit Classification of 31-35 are found in this database.</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>See Lineage.</horizpar> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr></vertaccr> </vertacc> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srcscale></srcscale> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>The Land Management Information Center developed the first nonpublic school file in 1998-99 for MDE-FNS. No modifications were made until 2005.  December 2005: In December, 2005, LMIC was provided a database from FNS containing all nonpublic schools. LMIC took this database and initially processed it against the existing Public school database to find duplicates. The remaining locations were geocoded in ArcMAP 9.1 using the most current TLG (The Lawrence Group) street centerline database and U.S. Census TIGER street database. Remaining unmatched addresses were tested online with Google maps and locations were found.  Some locations have been verified using FSA NAIP aerial photography. All others are unverified and may vary from exact location to centroid of a city or zip code.  December 2006: The Department of Education, Food and Nutrition Service (FNS) took ownership of this spatial database and made modifications based on data from the MDE database dated December 2006. Only Unit Classifications of 31-35 were developed in this spatial database. All others were discarded.</procdesc> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref></indspref> <direct>Point</direct> <mgmg3obj>Point</mgmg3obj> <mgmg3til>State</mgmg3til> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <geograph> <latres></latres> <longres></longres> </geograph> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn></mapprojn> <mgmg4par></mgmg4par> <otherprj></otherprj> </mapproj> <gridsys> <gridsysn>UTM</gridsysn> <utm> <utmzone>15E</utmzone> </utm> <spcs> <spcszone></spcszone> </spcs> <mgmg4coz></mgmg4coz> <mgmg4adj></mgmg4adj> </gridsys> <planci> <coordrep> <absres></absres> <ordres></ordres> </coordrep> <distbrep> <distres></distres> </distbrep> <plandu>Meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>NAD83</horizdn> <ellips>Geodetic Reference System 80</ellips> </geodetic> </horizsys> <vertdef> <altsys> <altdatum>Not applicable</altdatum> <altunits></altunits> </altsys> <depthsys> <depthdn>Not applicable</depthdn> <depthdu></depthdu> </depthsys> </vertdef> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover>UNI_TYP (2,2,I) - 2 digit MDE unit classification.  UNI_MAJ - (4,4,I) - School district number.  UNI_IMD (3,3,I) - MDE school database number.  ORGID (12,12,C) - A  twelve string combination of the UNI_TYPE, UNI_MAJ and UNI_IMD with zeros added to fill in string. Added at LMIC but utilized by MDE as unique identifier for all programs.  SCHNAME (40,40,C) - School name  ADDRESS (40,40,C) - First mailing address.  It may or may not be the same as the school location.  CITY (24,24,C) - City  STATE (5,5,C) - MN  ZIP (5,5,C) - 5 digit zipcode  ZIP4 (4,4,C) - 4 digit zipcode  GRADE - Range of grades at this location  SOURCE (4,4,C) - Source of geocoding.</eaover> <eadetcit>UNI_TYP - 2 digit MDE unit classification.   01  UNI_MAJ - School district number.    001 (Aitkin and Minneapolis)  ....  2902 R.T.R.  UNI_IMD - MDE school database number.  ORGID - A  twelve string combination of the UNI_TYPE, UNI_MAJ and UNI_IMD with zeros added to fill in string. Added at LMIC but utilized by MDE as unique identifier for all programs.  SCHNAME - School name  ADDRESS - School location address.  CITY - City  STATE - MN  ZIP - 5 digit zipcode  ZIP4 - 4 digit zipcode  GRADE - Range of grades at this location  SOURCE - Source of geocoding. Possible sources are:    ADDMT - Address matched    ONLIN - Address matched online at Google maps    NAIP - Location moved and verified using FSA NAIP aerial photography    NGA20 - Location moved and verified using higher resolution NGA aerial photography from MetroGIS    5cent - Location to zip code    7cent - Location to zip+2    9cent - Location to zip+4</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Scott Freburg</cntper> <cntorg>Minnesota Department of Education</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> Mailing and Physical</addrtype> <address>1500 Hwy 36 W</address> <city>Roseville</city> <state>MN</state> <postal>55113</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651-582-8789</cntvoice> <cntfax></cntfax> <cntemail>scott.freburg@state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>Non-public school program locations 2006-07</resdesc> <distliab>The Minnesota Department of Education (MDE) does not warrant the results you may obtain by using this dataset. This dataset is provided ''as is'' without express or implied warranties, including warranties of merchantability and fitness. In no event will MDE be liable for any consequential, incidental or special damages, including any lost profits or lost savings, even if an MDE  representative has been advised of the possibility of such damages or any other claim by any third party.</distliab> <stdorder> <digform> <digtinfo> <formname>Shapefile</formname> <formvern></formvern> <transize>less than 1 megabyte</transize> </digtinfo> </digform> <ordering>1.  GIS data:  this data set is distributed on the internet by clicking below after Online Linkage.  Doing so will tell your browser to start downloading a self-extracting 'ZIP' file which will contain the following:  - Data in shapefile (.shp, .shx., .dbf) format - Documentation (.html) - NOTICE.RTF, an important notice about this data set that can be read by most word processing software, and an ascii text version of the same notice (NOTICE.TXT)  After downloading this self-extracting 'zip' file (which will have an 'exe' extension), simply execute (run) the file.  (For example, you can double click it from Windows Explorer or File Manager).  Doing this will automatically extract the files described above.  2.  School district maps:  These maps show district and attendance boundaries, and public and non-public school program locations.  Download in PDF format or order printed wallmaps from:    http://www.gda.state.mn.us/maps/SchoolDistricts/</ordering> </stdorder> </distinfo> <metainfo> <metd>20071109</metd> <metc> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Scott Freburg</cntper> <cntorg>Minnesota Department of Education</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> Mailing and Physical</addrtype> <address>1500 Hwy 36 W</address> <city>Roseville</city> <state>MN</state> <postal>55113</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651-582-8789</cntvoice> <cntfax></cntfax> <cntemail>scott.freburg@state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </metc> <metstdn>Minnesota Geographic Metadata Guidelines</metstdn> <metstdv>1.2</metstdv> <metextns> <onlink>http://www.gis.state.mn.us/stds/metadata.htm</onlink> </metextns> </metainfo> </metadata>
